key_risks: Safety concerns due to past accidents and recent operational incidents
Regulatory hurdles and delays in FAA approvals
Financial sustainability challenges in a capital-intensive industry
Increasing competition from other space tourism companies
Environmental impact of space tourism operations
controversies: Detachment of an alignment pin during the 'Galactic 06' flight
Criticism over the environmental footprint of space tourism
environmental_issues: Carbon emissions and resource usage from space tourism operations
social_issues: High ticket prices limiting market accessibility
governance_issues: Low insider ownership (6.11%) potentially leading to alignment issues between management and shareholders
